mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recruit(recruitNum, subject, content, regDate, startDate, endDate, email, userCode, corporation, categoryNum) VALUES(#{recruitNum}, #{subject}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{email}, #{userCode}, #{corporation}, #{categoryNum})
mapper.select: SELECT categoryNum, career FROM careerCategory ORDER BY categoryNum
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM recruit r JOIN careerCategory c ON r.categoryNum = c.categoryNum

SELECT r.recruitNum, c.career, corporation, subject, TO_CHAR(startDate, 'YYYY.MM.DD') startDate, TO_CHAR(endDate, 'YYYY.MM.DD') endDate FROM recruit r JOIN careerCategory c ON r.categoryNum = c.categoryNum
ORDER BY recruitNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT recruitNum, subject, content, TO_CHAR(startDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startDate, TO_CHAR(endDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') endDate, r.email, r.userCode, corporation, cc.career FROM recruit r JOIN member m ON r.userCode = m.userCode LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT categoryNum, career FROM careerCategory ) cc ON r.categoryNum = cc.categoryNum WHERE recruitNum = #{recruitNum}

SELECT recruitNum, subject FROM recruit r JOIN member m ON r.userCode = m.userCode
AND (recruitNum > #{recruitNum})
ORDER BY recruitNum ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT recruitNum, subject FROM recruit r JOIN member m ON r.userCode = m.userCode
AND (recruitNum < #{recruitNum})
ORDER BY recruitNum DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recruitFile(fileNum, imageFileName, recruitNum) VALUES(recruitFile_seq.NEXTVAL, #{imageFilename}, #{recruitNum})
